name: PrókedexforMasterTrainers
0:
”Alexa, open my prokedex”
”Alexa, ask my prokedex for types super effective against fire”
”Alexa, ask my prokedex for Bulbasaur evolutions”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my prokedex
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This Skill is good to be used while you are playing the Pokémon games (1st to 7th generation). 

Can help you with very common questions like:

- Pokémon Evolutions (can answer where, when and how)
- Natures stats

Also in the middle of a battle you can just call for your Prókedex and ask it the opponent's:

- Abilities
- Types
- Super Effective against it Type
- Not Very Effective against it Type
- Not Effective against it Type
- Super Effective from it Type
- Not Very Effective from it Type
- Move Damage Class from it Type

Feel free to post feedbacks, we will read everyone.

This skill is neither sponsored nor endorsed by Nintendo or The Pokémon Company.
All rights belong to The Pokémon Company.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
